CVM is Fosco on this board I do know John from the Yahoo board and just FYI he does not post on StockTwits and he does not have a dog in this race for the reasons mentioned in this post We have talked at length about CVM AXSM etc I own both He only holds the latter after having done research on both of them and after spending money speaking to experts too I know he had questions regarding your spreadsheet which he found extremely helpful in his analysis I just wanted to state this not in defense of his opinion of CVM as I am long but as a defense of him person as he does not have different handles Nor do I This is something I find incredibly frustrating with this board when people come to conclusions incorrectly Best of luck to you as you have been extremely helpful to the entire CVM community I think you and John bring valid points which is helpful to all Thanks again for your analysis I would post this directly to you on Yahoo but I dont have a handle there
